io.github.kensuke1984.kibrary.butterworth

クラス ButterworthFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.kensuke1984.kibrary.butterworth.ButterworthFilter
  • 直系の既知のサブクラス:
    BandPassFilter, BandStopFilter, HighPassFilter, LowPassFilter

    public abstract class ButterworthFilter
extends java.lang.Object
    Masanori Saito recursive digital filter
    斎藤正徳 漸化式ディジタルフィルタ
    |Bn(σ)|2=1/(1+σ2n)
    Saito (1978) Default design is for zero-phase filter.

    If you want to create a causal one, use setBackward(boolean) and set true.

    • メソッドの詳細

      • getFrequencyResponse

        public abstract org.apache.commons.math3.complex.Complex getFrequencyResponse(double omega)
        Compute a value of Saito 1.7.
        Hj = (a1j +(a2j+1) cos ω -i(a 2j-1)sinω)
        /(b2j+1) cos ω -i(b2j-1)sinω)
        If you want to compute a compute Frequency responce, you have to multiply all of compute frequency for each filter(j) and consider a vaue of G.
        パラメータ:
        omega - ω: 2πfΔt
        戻り値:
        frequency responce for an input ω

        パラメータ:

        戻り値:
        フィルタをかけたあとの数列
